channel.title: Allstar Project(silab styled)
channel.description:
Alright well, i dont know if this is the right place to write this but.. I was thinking of making a new project to bring back the old styled sources.
- what i wanted to do was take a stable source and rebuild like an allstar scape or something example: old styled client with emote teleporting system, and old graphics ofc. Server will be meant to be a true private server like it once was meant to be, the point of a server is not to copy the original but to make it fun and (easy), so i was thinking throw in all those custom hats and different color whips and ect.
other features that should be in, Maybe a pkbox right at home and all the old minigames silab had to offer.
In addition i also have a lot of connection and can easily get the server populated
Webclient will be made and a website which i am good with
If you are a developer and want to work with me comment
this is my other work, its a server of another game. website: rainbow-pirates.com

i said recreate allstar on a stable source.
